Implication: "Methane is 34 times as powerful a greenhouse-gas warming blanket as carbon dioxide when judged on the timescale of a century."
Referring expressions: Carbon, methane  Methane, carbon dioxide, greenhouse-gas warming blanket
Formula: (exists a (IsEvaporated(a))) -> (exists c (exists a (exists d (IsAsPowerful(a,c) and IsJudgedOn(a,d)))))
